articles.title: Founding Anniversary of ASEAN Observed
articles.content:
Italian Preparatory Committee Inaugurated 
    Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- An Italian preparatory committee celebrating the 60th anniversary of the liberation of Korea was inaugurated in Rome on Aug. 4.
 Miriam Pelegrini Feri, president of the Group of Dialectical Materialists of Italy, was elected chairwoman of the preparatory committee.    
 The committee set a period of celebrations ending on Aug. 20 and decided to publish and distribute booklets devoted to the anniversary and organize colorful functions including a lecture, a photo exhibition and others in the period.

articles.content:
Greetings to Singaporean President 
    Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Singaporean President S. R. Nathan on August 5 on the occasion of the 40th anniversary of the national day of Singapore.
 The message sincerely wished the president and government greater successes in their work for prosperity and development of the country.
